items.content_html:
Faced with the possibility of another night of washing dishes by hand, a $425 dishwasher installation quote, and visiting family, I was suddenly hit by a wave of inspiration and turned plumber for the evening.

Behold, I present you a dishwasher that I installed myself. And it hasnâ€™t leaked (yet)!

Behold, I present you a dishwasher that I installed myself. And it hasnâ€™t leaked (yet)!

items.content_html:
Liberated another Touch ID sensor from a failing keyboard and put it to good use.

Also, turns out that the macro mode on camera on my iPhone makes a pretty good loupe!
items.content_text: Liberated another Touch ID sensor from a failing keyboard and put it to good use. Also, turns out that the macro mode on camera on my iPhone makes a pretty good loupe!

items.content_html:
The concave side of the bathroom mirror broke, and I felt compelled to replace it rather risk a glass cut.

So I measured it out and designed a 6mm thick panel which I printed in PETG. Added a star to the design while I was at it, because, why not?
items.content_text: The concave side of the bathroom mirror broke, and I felt compelled to replace it rather risk a glass cut. So I measured it out and designed a 6mm thick panel which I printed in PETG. Added a star to the design while I was at it, because, why not?

items.content_html: I missed the days where computing was simpler, so I pulled some retro parts together with an M4 Mac Mini.
items.content_text: I missed the days where computing was simpler, so I pulled [some](https://support.apple.com/en-us/docs/displays/109732) [retro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_pointing_devices#Apple_Pro_Mouse_(M5769)) [parts](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_keyboards#Apple_Keyboard_(109_and_78_keys)) together with an [M4 Mac Mini](https://support.apple.com/en-us/121555).

items.content_html:
Severance speaker.

I haven’t watched it, and I have no idea as to the significance of the speaker, yet. But it’s cute and I can always do with another desktop widget at work.

I’m using this guide: learn.adafruit.com/bluetooth…
